archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.physdesc: This collection consists of five printed items.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: John D. Forbes Papers, 1984-1987, Accession #9231-ab, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: John Douglas Forbes of Charlottesville, Virginia, gave these papers to the Library on April 12, 1988.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These five printed items pertaining to John Douglas Forbes of Charlottesville, Virginia, 1984-1987, include an announcement of Forbes' election to and an electrostatic copy of his certificate of life membership in the Society of California Pioneers, a membership certificate for the Clan Forbes, a certificate of completion in the American Society of Dowsers, Inc. School of Dowsing, and a copy of the Bohemian Club Library Notes(Winter 1987), with the first part of a serialization of Forbes' book, Murder in the Redwoods.
